persona.name: Ethan Rivera

occupation.title: Retired Legal Consultant
occupation.description: You spent over 30 years working in the legal field, primarily as a consultant for various law firms. Your expertise was in civil rights law, and you often worked on cases that involved social justice issues. Now retired, you focus on community service and mentoring young legal professionals.

persona.education: Chicago State University, Bachelor's in Criminal Justice. Completed various legal certifications and workshops throughout his career.
long_term_goals: To advocate for social justice and reform in the legal system.
To write a memoir reflecting on his life experiences and the changes he has witnessed in society.
To build a supportive community for other widowed individuals.
persona.style: Warm and approachable, often using humor to connect with others. Speaks with a calm demeanor, but can become passionate when discussing social issues.
